column28: Police had trailed Streeter, a suspect in a string of bar robberies, to the bar. Officers watched him put on a ski mask, pull out a gun and enter the bar, police said. Witnesses in the bar said Streeter fired a shot, ordered the 10 patrons and the bartender to the floor, then robbed them. Streeter ran out of the bar with a bag of money in one hand and the gun in the other. When ordered to stop and drop the gun, he fired at an undercover officer. Officers Robert Coffman and Richard Ey fired back, killing Streeter.
